notes: Ends if you become magic immune, and will have no effect if you are already magic immune.Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
desc: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form, unable to attack or be attacked, but take -40% extra magic damage. Using a Teleport Scroll or Boots of Travel dispels Ghost Form.
lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
